review: Two issues with this device make me give it a poor review:1) cannot be used in a hotelThis is because most hotels use security systems that will not let you set it up.  I've run into this at many hotels.  Once they had a tech support department that was helpful and manually added the MAC address in their system and then I could use it.  But that's beyond most hotel's tech support departments2) when I did get it to work, it did not stream all the sites I wanted to stream.  Maybe they'll fix this and include more sites, but don't assume you can use a chromecast to stream any video you want - you cannot.
